title: ITC hotel demerger plan gets competition watchdog's approval
description: The Competition Commission of India (CCI) has approved the demerger of ITC Ltd's hotel business into a separate entity, ITC Hotels Ltd. The new entity will be listed on stock exchanges after the demerger. ITC will continue to hold a 40% stake, while the remaining 60% will be held by the conglomerate's shareholders. The proposed internal restructuring exercise will not alter market dynamics.
